why: Produces the upstream artifact this command consumes: .workflow/reference_style/{package-name}/
Multi-phase execution with TodoWrite + validation patterns
Shares tools surface (Bash/Read/TodoWrite) and filesystem-first orchestration
Uses CLI-template driven prompts (templates under ~/.claude/workflows/cli-templates/...) similar to this command
Explicit phases and verification patterns for generated artifacts
Memory-group command style and frontmatter conventions
Strong sectioning/formatting discipline and structured artifact generation
Oracle implementation doc for gap analysis only (no-leak spec input)

selected.reason: Closest reusable execution-model match: produces .workflow/reference_style/* and demonstrates TodoWrite-driven phase orchestration + validation patterns.
